sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AddValueToCsvProperty</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AddValueToCsvProperty</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AddValueToCsvProperty = Class.create();
AddValueToCsvProperty.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	add: function(propertyName, newValue) {
		var property = gs.getProperty(propertyName);
		if (gs.nil(property)) {
			gs.setProperty(propertyName, newValue);
			return;
		}
		
		var list = property.split(',');
		if (list.indexOf(newValue) >= 0) {
			return;
		}
		
		list.push(newValue);
		gs.setProperty(propertyName, list.join(','));
	},

    type: 'AddValueToCsvProperty'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-08-26 22:38:16</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0f8a49810f2333005605539ac4767e3f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AddValueToCsvProperty</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="System (glidesoft)" source="glidesoft">079c7c036d2220100acb70b3534330b0</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0f8a49810f2333005605539ac4767e3f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-08-27 15:06:11</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>494</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
